short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows metadata about wiki pages reliability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that shows metadata about Wikipedia entries based on public information available at XTools (e.g. https://xtools.wmflabs.org/articleinfo/en.wikipedia.org/Wikipedia )
